recipes.title: Pesto Pasta
recipes.description: This simple pesto pasta dish is quick and easy to make, and bursting with flavor.
directions: Cook pasta according to package directions.
In a food processor, blend together basil, garlic, pine nuts, and Parmesan cheese until smooth.
Slowly drizzle in olive oil and blend until mixture is well combined and has a smooth consistency.
Toss pasta with pesto sauce and top with additional Parmesan cheese.

recipes.title: Chicken Stir Fry
recipes.description: This delicious chicken stir fry is packed with vegetables and protein, and is perfect for a healthy weeknight dinner.
directions: In a wok or large skillet, heat oil over high heat.
Add chicken and stir-fry until browned and cooked through, about 5 minutes.
Add vegetables and stir-fry until crisp-tender, about 3 minutes.
In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, rice vinegar, honey, and cornstarch until smooth.
Pour sauce over stir fry and toss to coat. Cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, until sauce has thickened and vegetables are coated.
ingredients: 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into thin strips
2 cups mixed vegetables (such as bell peppers, snow peas, carrots, and onions)

recipes.title: Spaghetti and Meatballs
recipes.description: This classic Italian dish is always a crowd-pleaser, with tender meatballs and a rich tomato sauce over a bed of spaghetti.
directions: In a large bowl, mix together ground beef, bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese, garlic, egg, salt, and pepper.
Form mixture into small meatballs and place on a baking sheet.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, until meatballs are browned and cooked through.
In a large pot, bring tomato sauce to a simmer over medium heat.
Add meatballs to the pot and simmer for an additional 10-15 minutes, until heated through.
Meanwhile, cook spaghetti according to package directions.
Serve spaghetti with meatballs and sauce on top.
